column4: I need some help with X.org. or is it X11? anyway...i need some help
i wanted to re-enable the GDM restart with Ctrl Alt Backspace and used the command setxkbmap -option terminate:ctrl_alt_f9
now i need to know how to undo that....
graphical way is to go to system > preferences > keyboard > layouts > options > key sequence to kill x server
